message.body: I can't wait to hold you for hours
I don't think a boyfriend has used those words to me maybe ever. And I'd have it no other way. Likewise, my love.
When do you fly out? The 20th to the...?
Well it's actually a little variable but yea - 23rd or 24th. I might take that extra day to spend with t√∫
Also, This fall would be the perfect time to visit Portland... I'm playing Tobias in Sweeney. And you know that am Toby in real life.
Perhaps we will have a gay old time?
!!!!!!! Whoaaaa the world aligns for us. Send me the dates for your performances - and yes gay times will be had by all
It's because of the solstice I'm sure. Perf are September 20th - October 28th
Awesome, my school doesn't start until October!
